name: Just 3 Blocks
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 49 - Unstable

It's a tetris like, but not really like tetris. Complete high score by making full lines. Amount of points depends of the amount of each blocks in a complete line.

Whiile the theme is "unstable", I guess I ended up pretty far from the theme when I resized the game (too big of a scope (^^"))

Still, he game contains some surprises if you click enough. So don't hesitate to click !
--------------

Use arrow keys and mouse to play.

M to mute music.

A top 10 is included, but it's a local top 10 (^^")
